snippet: Ted Cruz suggests that Donald J. Trump is unwittingly bending the race toward Mr. Cruz, and this may partly explain Mr. Cruz’s deference to Mr. Trump.
abstract: Political Memo; Ted Cruz's deference to presidential rival Donald J Trump may stem from Trump's clearing way for Cruz by absorbing brunt of political scrutiny and attracting favorable attention to outsider views; Cruz would benefit from Trump's eventual downfall, raising question of how best to position himself relative to frontrunner.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Ted Cruz suggests that Donald J. Trump is unwittingly bending the race toward Mr. Cruz, and this may partly explain Mr. Cruz’s deference to Mr. Trump.

headline.print_headline: Cruz Sees Trump’s Candidacy as Boon to His Own
headline.main: Ted Cruz Sees Boon to His Campaign in Donald Trump
